chart.title: Account Management Over Time
chart.searchTemplate: | `tstats` count from datamodel=Change_Analysis where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management $bunit$ $category$ $special$ by _time,All_Changes.action span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by All_Changes.action | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Changes")`

table.title: Account Lockouts
table.searchTemplate: | tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Change_Analysis where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.result="lockout" $bunit$ $category$ $special$ by All_Changes.src,All_Changes.Account_Management.src_nt_domain,All_Changes.user | sort 100 - count | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Changes")` | `drop_dm_object_name("Account_Management")`

chart.title: Account Management By Source User
chart.searchTemplate: | tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Change_Analysis where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management $bunit$ $category$ $special$ by All_Changes.Account_Management.src_user| `drop_dm_object_name("All_Changes")` | `drop_dm_object_name("Account_Management")` | sort 10 - count

table.title: Top Account Management Events
table.searchTemplate: | tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Change_Analysis where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management $bunit$ $category$ $special$ by _time,All_Changes.action span=1h | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Changes")` | stats sparkline(sum(count),1h) as sparkline,sum(count) as count by action | sort 10 - count
